column4: guys.. one question.. i downloaded ubuntu 10 series [ .iso DVD file ] .. but when trying to bring it up in VM .. just a blank screen shows up
any additional config we need to do ...unlike other flavours
did you download a live version?
virtual box.. i shld be specific
iam able to install/use ubuntu 9 .. but not 10 series
i'd say ditch the dvd, and just install from the iso and see what happens
yes.. i booted the virtual box .. using the .iso itself
just a black screen comes up
i hate to send you away, but you'd have better luck on the virtualbox channel
i hope you are referring me :)
somebody over there will likely have run into the issue
will try in the vbox channel .. be right back :)
I'm not saying that nobody here could help, just that that sounds like a virtual box problem, not an ubuntu problem, so those guys might be of better assistance
